Text:
Well the name "Buried Treasure" is pretty generic, but IMDB has an entry saying that BT is an unreleased 2012 series with the following explanation:

More at IMDbPro Âť
Buried Treasure (TV Series 2012)
Reality-TV
Not yet released
(voting begins after release)  

Starring antiques experts and appraisers Leigh and Leslie Keno, who travel across the country to help people sell collectibles lying around their homes. 

So, is this what this torrent is?

Yes, that's what it is.

And if you share an interest in the arts, or antiques, you're likely to find it rather entertaining.  

I did, for what that's worth (essentially nothing, as you don't know me from Adam).
